extendedInfo.description: Forget all you know about Tip Calculators! Tip Calculator Ultimate is definitely the BEST in Android market!This great looking Tip Calculator, will not only help you calculate the tip amount easily, but will also be your best friend in the restaurant. Did you enjoy the dinner? Share your experience with friends using built-in Facebook sharing! The food was great, but the service lousy? Use our built-in "Help Me Decide" option to calculate the exact tip percentage! Like to gamble? Let our "Feeling Lucky" option choose the tip percentage for you! Just tap on the bill amount to get started.Features:*********- Calculate tip in real-time- Easily split the bill between any number of people- Round tip amount to avoid heavy calculations- Use built-in keyboard to avoid rotating your phone- Use "Help me decide" to calculate tip, based on your experience- Use "Feeling Lucky" to randomly choose tip amount- Share on Facebook- Great and intuitive design- Fits any screen size and supports rotation- Absolutely FREE to usePlease feel free to contact us for any requests and feedback!Bon AppÃ©tit!Keywords: tip calculater, help me decide, feeling lucky, bill,calculator,dinner,meal,split,tip,divide,bill calculate,tip calculate,split bill,split tip,tip calculator,utilities,finance,bill calculator,share bill,money,restaurant,facebook

reviews.title: Too bad...
reviews.comment: That I can\'t use the app. When I try to enter the amount the key pad that appears is very narrow and I can\'t see the numbers. Too bad would went using this app, plz fix. No option for settings for me to make changes.
reviews.author: Nancy Cuenca

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: I love this app, however the numbers when typing in amount are to close together and unreadable. Please fix so I can rate it a 5 stars.
reviews.author: Michele Lindsey

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: If you eat out you definitely need this app! Great for dining with groups. It splits the bill for you! Download now! ! :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horrible interface
reviews.comment: The menu looks like it scroll but it doesn\'t so u cant read everything and the number input area is squished together so you cant read the numbers.
reviews.author: Charles Sylvester

reviews.comment: Great tip calculator! Love the new functions! Especially, help me decide - no more doubts - you get what you deserve!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app. Using it all the time!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good-looking app. Does what it says. Those up-down buttons are a little difficult to press.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: does what it says
reviews.comment: but text doesn\'t line up correctly and can\'t seem to find an option to change the currency from dollars so is only of use in the USA, Canada or Australia.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Better than most
reviews.comment: I DL ?any tip calcs and even though this one has ads at the bottom, it\'s probably one of the best that I\'ve seen.
reviews.author: Jeff Loo

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t take sales tax into account
reviews.author: A Google User
